page.title: 11Batley Feast
page.content: The feast (fair) comes to Batley twice a year.It is held at the Branch Road Site,next to the bus station. There are a lot of things to do at the feast.There are space invaders,bandits,hot dog stalls, shooting galleries,etc.You get lots of chances to win prizes like soft toys, mugs and goldfish. There are lots of rides at the feast. My favourite is the dodgems-where you can ride around bumping into other cars.I don't like the waltzer,it makes me feel sick. The feast usually stays for about a week.I usually go down at night with my friends.After it has finished at Batley,the feast moves on to another site in another town.
